snippet: Novak Djokovic began his bid to hold on to his number one ranking with an easy win over Gilles Muller in the Paris Masters second round while Andy Murray struggled through and Stan Wawrinka faltered on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic began his bid to hold on to his number one ranking with an easy win over Gilles Muller in the Paris Masters second round while Andy Murray struggled through and Stan Wawrinka faltered on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Cruises, Murray Struggles, Wawrinka Out in Paris
headline.main: Djokovic Cruises, Murray Struggles, Wawrinka Out in Paris
